data.name: PGA TOUR 2K21 Puma Swag Pack
data.detailed_description:
Make your MyPLAYER the best-dressed Pro on the TOUR with blinged out apparel from Puma and show up dripping in all gold everything and watch jaws drop on the course with bonus HB Studios gear.

The PGA TOUR 2K21 Puma Swag Pack includes:

- Puma Flat Cap
- Puma Shoes
- Puma Belt
- Gold Shirt
- Gold Pants
- Gold Glove
- Gold-Tier Watch
- Black Aviator Sunglasses
- Hockey Stick Putter
- And More!
data.about_the_game:
Make your MyPLAYER the best-dressed Pro on the TOUR with blinged out apparel from Puma and show up dripping in all gold everything and watch jaws drop on the course with bonus HB Studios gear.

data.short_description: Make your MyPLAYER the best-dressed Pro on the TOUR with apparel from Puma and bonus HB Studios gear. The PGA TOUR 2K21 Puma Swag Pack includes: - Puma Flat Cap - Puma Shoes - Gold Shirt - Gold Pants - Hockey Stick Putter - And More!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-760 @ 2.80GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GTX 650 with 1GB Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 CPU @ 3.40GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7850 or NVIDIA GTX 660 with 2GB video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
